derivation: (Ezra 2:2 or מִכְמָשׁ; or מִכְמַשׁ; (Nehemiah 11:31), from H3647 (כָּמַס); hidden;
outline:
Michmas or Michmash = "hidden"
  1. a city in Benjamin lying near Ramah and approximately 10 miles (16 km) north of Jerusalem; probably modern 'Mukhmas'
strongs_def: Mikmas or Mikmash, a place in Palestine
